SELECT BO,OPERATION,VERSION,OPERATION_NAME,OPERATION_DESC FROM M_OPERATION OG WHERE OG.SITE=#{site} AND EXISTS( SELECT OPERATION_BO AS BO FROM M_NC_GROUP_OPERATION OGM WHERE NC_GROUP_BO=#{ncGroupBO} AND OG.BO=OGM.OPERATION_BO )
